messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats run many of our biggest cities including Liverpool, Sheffield and Bristol. Won more votes than Labour in the last election. Are stronger now than at any time since 1929. Can deliver real change across Britain today.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. Nick Clegg’s tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

contactInformation.address: Richard Baum c/o Freepost RRLB-YRJG-BXXC, 8A Vicar Lane, Prestwich, Manchester M25 1NL

endorsements.endorser: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats
endorsements.endorsement: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.

images.caption: Nick Clegg and Richard Baum are shown with cheers from supporters, indicating endorsement and party unity.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet includes a form to help support Richard Baum and the Liberal Democrats, indicating a call to action for campaign assistance and donations.
